snippet: The International Contemporary Ensemble, joined by Third Coast Percussion, performed works by Julio Estrada at the Miller Theater on Thursday night.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews concert of works by Julio Estrada, performed by International Contemporary Ensemble and Third Coast Percussion, at Miller Theater as part of its Composer Portraits series.
lead_paragraph: The International Contemporary Ensemble, joined by Third Coast Percussion, performed works by Julio Estrada at the Miller Theater on Thursday night.

headline.seo: Julio Estrada, at Miller Theater, in ICE Composer Portraits
headline.main: Ritual Reaches: Playing the Backside of a Violin, Using a Guitar Like a Cello
headline.print_headline: Ritual Reaches: Playing the Backside of a Violin, Using a Guitar Like a Cello
